title: HOAXED is out
author: VD
content_html: HOAXED, the new documentary produced by Mike Cernovich, is now out and available on demand. We’re all working on upping our video game, but Cerno is really taking it to an entirely new level. Director Scooter Downey did an excellent job of putting together an entirely professional film production.
content_text:
HOAXED, the new documentary produced by Mike Cernovich, is now out and
available on demand
. We’re all working on upping our video game, but Cerno is really taking it to an entirely new level. Director Scooter Downey did an excellent job of putting together an entirely professional film production.
